articles.author: Julia Hollingsworth and Isaac Yee, CNN
articles.title: New Zealand officials file charges over deadly White Island volcano eruption - CNN
articles.description: New Zealand officials have filed charges against 13 parties that allegedly failed to meet their health and safety obligations when visiting an active volcano which killed 22 when it erupted last year.
